description: This Council is asked for its observations on an application submitted to the City of Westminster for Variation of condition 1, 5, 8, of planning permission dated 13th May 2022 (RN:21/08268/FULL) for the Demolition and rebuilding of mews building to rear; replacement infill extension within internal lightwell, additional dormer at fourth floor level, instillation of plant equipment and lift, internal alterations including removal and addition of partitions; all in connection with the use of the building as four flats (3 x 2 bed units & 1 x 3 bed unit). Namely, Installation of new dry risers in the main staircore; New structural walls located at Lower Ground Floor level; New position for water tank at Lower Ground Floor level with rearranged internal walls; Revised Lower Ground Floor staircase lobby; Alterations to proposed floor levels of front lightwell; Alteration to proposed floor levels of Lower Ground Floor to accommodate tanking; Proposed use of one vault as a bathroom; Installation of additional fire rated doors; Restoration of main stair; Alteration to bathroom location on second floor; Alterations to the second floor glazed link including a door to access the lightwell roof; Alterations to bathroom layouts on third and fourth floors; and removal of the ventilation louvres from roof and mechanical louvered enclosure; and further design details provided.
